name: Resident Evil 10th Anniversary Collection
summary: Resident Evil 10th Anniversary Collection is a 2006 box-set of three of Capcom's then-recent additions to the Resident Evil series on GameCube to celebrate the 10th Anniversary. Released to celebrate the tenth anniversary of the release of 1996's Resident Evil as a GameStop exclusive, the box-set contains Resident Evil, Resident Evil Zero and Resident Evil 4.
